nodes.text: Star Wars Rebels Magazine 3 is the third issue of Star Wars Rebels Magazine. It was originally published by Egmont UK Ltd in the UK on March 25, 2015, and by Titan Magazines in the US on February 16, 2016. The UK version includes the original comic story "The fake Jedi" by Martin Fisher and Bob Molesworth, which was later published in the US version's second issue, while the US version includes the comic stories "Kallus' Hunt" and "Return of the Slavers".
